name: Horror Huntdown
description:
The game take place in 1885, in a cold forest between the canada and the US, far from
any human activity where you was task to hunt monster called Wendigos

Unfortunatly, thing didn't realy go according to plan. You were attack in the night by those demonwho were missing the tast of human meat.

Every one in the expidition died and you are the only who survive, but for how long ?
 If you want to get out of here, you're gonna need to kill all of the wendigo left in the valley.

You can follow me on Twitter @deer_eyee
